name: Cargo Truck Mountain Drive Sim
description:
Drive the legend cargo truck on mountain in this simulator game with smallest size of 24MB only.

You are mountain truck driver whose job is to deliver the cargo from one place to other.

Becoming a mountain truck driver was your childhood dream & now this dream will become true.

Your job is to pick up the cargo from one hill station and drive the truck successfully to other warehouse.

Get behind the big beast monster truck and start delivering the cargo on the beautiful hill drives station.

Drive the mountain truck in this new mobile simulation game and improve your mountain truck driving skills.

Become off-road truck driver legend by driving the truck on the offroad mountain hill tracks.

Improvise your truck driving skills in this truck driving simulator game of 2016 and take them to next level.

Choose between different rides and use them as your cargo vehicle. Drive with great care on mountain roads.

The hill roads are very dangerous and very steep. So you have to be very careful while driving on these roads.

You also have time limit on making your delivery. So keep your eye on road as well as on time bar.

If you crash your truck by falling off the cliff, or crash in to mountains. Or if you cant make it within time the level will be failed.

Choose between 4x4 off-road pickup, flatbed truck & a Big muscle cargo truck and let your journey begin on these cliffs.

Enjoy the beautiful hill scenes while driving this heavy loader on the beautiful hill valley.

Park your truck after crossing the finish point to finish the level. Keep your engine and start the second mission.

Drive the truck, complete the missions earn points and unlock new and power beast truck to take them on ride.

Make high score, beat your own high scores, top the leader board and earn respect other mountain truck drivers.

Features:

Realistic mountain hill drive.

Controls are very comfortable and smooth.

Choose between different cargo delivery vehicles.

All rides are tuned with good driving physics.

Lots of challenging levels to play and enjoy.

Improve your truck driving skills on difficult hill offroad tracks.

Feel like a real truck driver what he feels in real life.

Select between different controls to drive the trucks.

How To Driver:

Tilt your mobile left & right device in tilt mood to.

Use steering wheel to drive in Steering mood.

Tap on left and right buttons in GUI mood to drive the vehicle.

Tap on accelerator to drive the vehicle.

Hit brake to stop and keep it hold to reverse.
